Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: heartshaped \heart"shaped`\, heart-shaped \heart"-shaped`\(h[aum]rt"sh[=a]pt`), a. Having the shape of a heart; cordate; -- of a leaf shape. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: heartshaped \heart"shaped`\, heart-shaped \heart"-shaped`\(h[aum]rt"sh[=a]pt`), a. Having the shape of a heart; cordate; -- of a leaf shape. [1913 Webster]
heart-shaped adj : (of a leaf) shaped like a heart [syn: {cordate}, {cordiform}]
